definition: an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles, have as a feature
details:
noun
- an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles
- the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin
= example: the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin
= synonyms: lineament
- a prominent attribute or aspect of something
= example: a prominent attribute or aspect of something
= synonyms: characteristic
- (linguistics) a distinctive characteristic of a linguistic unit that serves to distinguish it from other units of the same kind
= synonyms: feature of speech
- a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine
= example: a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine
= synonyms: feature article
- the principal full-length film in a program at a movie theater
= example: the principal full-length film in a program at a movie theater
= synonyms: feature film
verb
- have as a feature
= example: have as a feature
= synonyms: have
- wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner
= synonyms: sport
